description:
Heck, the only thing that would make it better is if it had optional line numbers and came as a GNOME 3 dropdown extension. But that's just me.

Great idea for all those little things that don't need a full text editor. It's suprising how often you use it.

The idea is incredibly cool, and it is an invaluable part of my workflow now. However, because there is no top bar you can't move the window around unless you open the about page, and I found that to be very inconvinient sometimes. I imagine adding an invisible(of the same color as the background) appbar would fix that.
